meanings.definition: A toxic insecticide used to treat lice and scabies.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed lindane to get rid of the lice infestation.
meanings.sent2: She applied lindane carefully to treat her scabies.
meanings.sent3: The lice threw a party, unaware of the lindane ambush awaiting them.
meanings.sent4: The lindane worked like a silent assassin against the scabies.
meanings.sent5: The smell of lindane lingered in the room, a reminder of the battle against pests.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacist will lindane the lotion before selling it.
meanings.sent2: He lindaned the affected area to eliminate the parasites.
meanings.sent3: The dog seemed puzzled as the vet lindaned its fur.
meanings.sent4: She carefully lindaned the fabric to ensure all insects were gone.
meanings.sent5: The farmer lindaned the crops, protecting them from harmful pests.
